summary: This mod will decrease the frequency of snowstorms in Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
-------------
CONTENT
-------------

Sure Skyrim is a cold and ruthless landscape, but I have found the frequency of snowstorms to be distracting!

With this plugin, there will be fewer snowstorms in both the snowy regions and mountains. Please note that storms will still occur! But with a more reasonable ...infrequency. 

-------------------
INSTALLATION
-------------------

Simply extract the Fewer Snowstorms plugin file into your Steam/SteamApps/common/skyrim/Data folder, and enjoy!

--------------
UNINSTALL
--------------

Remove the following files from your Steam/SteamApps/common/skyrim/Data folder:

Fewer Snowstorms.esp

Or simply deselect the plugin in your Skyrim Data Files.
author: e7seif
